Body: I downloaded the java documentation to read on my phone but i can't use the html viewer on my phone because it cant use links.When I tried using google chrome and going to the file location its not allowing chrome to access the location.Does anyone know how to allow chrome to access the folder or know a folder that I could move the documents to?The documents I have. It's the Zip file I'm using.Before someone says I could use the epub or mobi, they are missing some of the bits i want to read.Im using an HTC M9 and the location im trying to access is file:///download/tutorial/tutorial.Thanks for any help:)
Title: using chrome to access HTML files on android

history.Text: I downloaded the java documentation to read on my phone but i can't use the html viewer on my phone because it cant use links.When I tried using google chrome and going to the file location its not allowing chrome to access the location.Does anyone know how to allow chrome to access the folder or know a folder that I could move the documents to?[The documents I have.][1] It's the Zip file I'm using.Before someone says I could use the epub or mobi, they are missing some of the bits i want to read.Im using an HTC M9 and the location im trying to access is file:///download/tutorial/tutorial.Thanks for any help:)  [1]: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/java-tutorial-downloads-2005894.html
using chrome to access HTML files on android
